remarks: Right composition with a function on the index sets yields a monoid homomorphism of structure powers.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)
statement:
pwsco1mhm.y $e |- Y = ( R ^s A ) $.
pwsco1mhm.z $e |- Z = ( R ^s B ) $.
pwsco1mhm.c $e |- C = ( Base ` Z ) $.
pwsco1mhm.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Mnd ) $.
pwsco1mhm.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
pwsco1mhm.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. W ) $.
pwsco1mhm.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
pwsco1mhm $p |- ( ph -> ( g e. C |-> ( g o. F ) ) e. ( Z MndHom Y ) ) $.
$d C g $.
$d F g $.
$d Y g $.
$d Z g $.
$d g ph $.
